inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getSecretRotation.

secretId.description: Specifies the secret containing the version that you want to retrieve. You can specify either the ARN or the friendly name of the secret.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getSecretRotation.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

rotationLambdaArn.description: Decrypted part of the protected secret information that was originally provided as a string.

rotationRules.description: Decrypted part of the protected secret information that was originally provided as a binary. Base64 encoded.
